title: Haste Other
data:
{{version030}}
{{Flavour|Speeds the actions of a nearby ally.}}

'''Haste Other''' is a monster-only spell which gives the [[Haste]] status to a creature other than the caster. This makes it a pure support spell, and one whose threat level is entirely dependent on how dangerous the nearby monsters are. 

Monsters can only use this spell on other monsters of the same [[type|genus]], e.g. [[deep troll shaman]]s can only haste trolls. Note that salamanders are considered part of the "naga" genus, so [[salamander mystic]]s can target both salamanders and nagas.
